# Load packages 
```{r}
#clear R environment
rm(list = ls())

# check for a package, install and load 
pkgCheck <- function(x){ 
  if (!require(x,character.only = TRUE)){
    install.packages(x,dependencies=TRUE)
    if(!require(x,character.only = TRUE)) {
      stop()
    }
  }
}

pkgCheck("raster")
pkgCheck("spsurvey")
pkgCheck("terra")
pkgCheck("raster")
pkgCheck("ggplot2")
pkgCheck("tibble")
pkgCheck("readr")
pkgCheck("dplyr")
pkgCheck("tidyr")
pkgCheck("scales")

# load self-written functions 
source("mth_functions.R")
```

# Regression Analysis 
```{r}
# plot results 
ggplot(results, aes(x = foen_hsi, y = shannon)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = lm)

# obtain regression model 
lm_foen <- lm(shannon ~ foen_hsi, data = results)
summary(lm_foen)
```
